name: Jazz Hands Jingle
curse: Do jazz hands everywhere you walk.

name: Rhyme Time Bind
curse: Everything you say must end in a rhyme.

name: Ho Ho Hysteria
curse: End every sentence with 'Ho Ho Ho.'

name: Sing-Song Suffering
cure: Perform a Christmas carol for the group.

name: Meow Malediction
curse: Make only cat sounds until cured.

name: Mini-Step Madness
curse: Walk only in tiny steps until cured.

name: Laugh Loud Lament
curse: Laugh loudly after everything someone says.

name: Toy Soldier Trial
curse: Walk stiff like a toy soldier until cured.
